summary: This Amendment to the Employment Agreement between Dollar General Corporation and Steven R. Deckard, effective November 12, 2025, extends the "Restricted Period" to 30 months post-termination and provides Deckard with a $2,000,000 lump sum payment, contingent on executing a Release Agreement. All other terms of the original Agreement remain unchanged.
